title: Answering Your Questions About the Roe Verdict
description:
The overturning of Roe has created an astounding number of questions and problems, and the fact is that we don’t know for sure how the landscape will change in the next few years or even months. This week, Dr. Sydnee uses the best available information to answer listener questions about what the Roe decision means for those seeking medical care related to pregnancy, including the morning after pill, vasectomies as contraception, and ectopic pregnancies.

Addendum: There is a prescription form of emergency contraception called Ella that may be more effective in larger bodies. Speak to your primary care physician for more information.

Resources:
Abortion On Our Own Terms: https://abortiononourownterms.org/
https://apiaryps.org/
https://www.abortionfinder.org/

Music: "Medicines" by The Taxpayers https://taxpayers.bandcamp.com/
author: sawbones@maximumfun.org (Justin & Dr. Sydnee McElroy)
